name: Verify the REST response after the POST request
id: com/testing/stories/consult_dictionary/MyHotelService_Validation.story;Verify the REST response after the POST request

testSteps.description: Verify the REST response after the POST request #1: {baseURI=http://localhost:9999/com.jaxrs.api, BASE_PATH=/webapi/hotels, ENDPOINT=/add, REQUEST_TYPE=POST, BODY={"hotelName": "Nirvana","location": "Kazhipattur","ratings": "5","landmark": " Opp to Victoria Towers","startedOn": " 19/09/2008","famousDish": "Appam"}}

children.description: Given I have a Base URI {http://localhost:9999/com.jaxrs.api} for the REST API
And its body message is {{"hotelName": "Nirvana","location": "Kazhipattur","ratings": "5","landmark": " Opp to Victoria Towers","startedOn": " 19/09/2008","famousDish": "Appam"}}
When I send the {POST} request to RestAPI
Send request: POST, {"hotelName": "Nirvana","location": "Kazhipattur","ratings": "5","landmark": " Opp to Victoria Towers","startedOn": " 19/09/2008","famousDish": "Appam"}
Then the REST API should return me a valid response

title: Verify the REST response after the POST request

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I have a Base URI <baseURI> for the REST API
And its base path is <BASE_PATH>
And its endpoint is <ENDPOINT>
And its body message is <BODY>
When I send the <REQUEST_TYPE> request to RestAPI
Then the REST API should return me a valid response
